item.title: CVE-2024-29031|2024-03-21T22:16:03.997Z -- meshery -- meshery
item.description: Meshery is an open source, cloud native manager that enables the design and management of Kubernetes-based infrastructure and applications. A SQL injection vulnerability in Meshery prior to version 0.7.17 allows a remote attacker to obtain sensitive information via the `order` parameter of `GetMeshSyncResources`. Version 0.7.17 contains a patch for this issue.
